markdownSourceMode.title: Markdown Source Mode
markdownSourceMode.description: Two ways to get Markdown document source, try the other one if one has issues
markdownSourceMode.getDoc: Page displayed content, getDoc API, cannot get collapsed blocks
markdownSourceMode.exportMdContent: Export Markdown content, exportMdContent API, content is more complete, will remove some footnotes via regex, may (very small probability) cause impact

color.title: Color List
color.description: A list of colors to use as the branch and circle colors for each node. If none is provided, d3.schemeCategory10 will be used, default: d3.schemeCategory10, refer to: https://markmap.js.org/docs/json-options

colorFreezeLevel.title: Color Freeze Level
colorFreezeLevel.description: Freeze color at the specified level of branches, i.e. all child branches will use the color of their ancestor node at the freeze level. 0 for no freezing at all, default: 0, refer to: https://markmap.js.org/docs/json-options

duration.title: Animation Duration
duration.description: The animation duration when folding/unfolding a node, default: 500, refer to: https://markmap.js.org/docs/json-options

maxWidth.title: Max Width
maxWidth.description: The max width of each node content. 0 for no limit, default: 0, refer to: https://markmap.js.org/docs/json-options

initialExpandLevel.title: Initial Expand Level
initialExpandLevel.description: The maximum level of nodes to expand on initial render. -1 for expanding all levels, default: -1, refer to: https://markmap.js.org/docs/json-options

extraJs.title: Extra JavaScript
extraJs.description: A list of JavaScript URLs. This is useful to add more features like Katex plugins, default: none, refer to: https://markmap.js.org/docs/json-options

extraCss.title: Extra CSS
extraCss.description: A list of CSS URLs. This is useful to add more features like Katex plugins, default: none, refer to: https://markmap.js.org/docs/json-options

zoom.title: Allow Zoom
zoom.description: Whether to allow zooming the markmap, default: true, refer to: https://markmap.js.org/docs/json-options

pan.title: Allow Pan
pan.description: Whether to allow panning the markmap, default: true, refer to: https://markmap.js.org/docs/json-options

htmlParser.title: HTML Parser Options
htmlParser.description: Pass options to the internal HTML parser, for example to override the default selectors for elements to display, refer to: https://markmap.js.org/docs/json-options

spacingHorizontal.title: Horizontal Spacing
spacingHorizontal.description: Horizontal spacing between nodes, default: 80, refer to: https://markmap.js.org/docs/json-options

spacingVertical.title: Vertical Spacing
spacingVertical.description: Vertical spacing between nodes, default: 5, refer to: https://markmap.js.org/docs/json-options

activeNode.title: Active Node
activeNode.description: Settings for the active node. placement: 'visible' (ensure the active node is in the viewport) or 'center' (center the active node), default: { placement: 'visible' }, refer to: https://markmap.js.org/docs/json-options

lineWidth.title: Line Width
lineWidth.description: The stroke width of lines between nodes, refer to: https://markmap.js.org/docs/json-options
